attributes.action: STOP LANSDOWNE HEDGE FUND'S  SHORTING OF PRUDENTIAL plc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The title say's it all!
The public now knows the 'share shorting game' and the damage it does to ORDINARY PEOPLE that pay for the damage caused in extra taxation. 
Private Profits at the expense of ALL that matter and vote.

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition as it does not relate to Government policy. You may wish to reword your petition to address Government policy on the general issue of share shorting eg: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/shortsell/
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
